feed.title: Charsible Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Streamyfin: v0.4.2
entry.content:
Highlights

  • A download queue for downloading multiple items in a row
  • Badges for more information about movies/episodes
  • Keep the screen awake as long as the app is open

Changes

  • Fix formatting for specials seasons
  • Added headers to HLS stream URL
  • More bitrate options
  • Report playback stop on pause
  • Limit the overview text to 140 chars, with an option to expand

entry.title: New release for Streamyfin: v0.5.1
entry.content:
Highlights

Both the Android and iOS apps are now available on the respective app store! No more test flight, APKs or betas for those who don't want to deal with that. Expect a bit slower updates through the official channels though.

  • There are now settings for things like auto-rotate and open full screen video immediately. You can find them in the settings screen.
  • Search page now has a native search bar on iOS.

entry.title: New release for Streamyfin: v0.6.0
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Improved home screen design
  • Setting to change device codec profile (be careful)
  • Setting to force direct play (use carefully and make sure your video files are supported on the client)
  • Better music library layout
  • Options to select no subtitles

Releases are sent for review to the respective app stores and might take up to several days to be approved.

entry.title: New release for Streamyfin: v0.6.1
entry.content:
Highlights

  • New library filter
  • Infinite scroll for media lists on home screen
  • Design improvements
  • Added small padding to android navbar
  • Fixed some bugs

entry.title: New release for Streamyfin: v0.8.1
entry.content:
Here's a new release that I think you'll like!

A special shoutout to our Discord community! If you’re not already part of the Discord, come join us—there’s always room for more: https://discord.gg/zyGKHJZvv4

Highlights

  • Working websockets support
  • New global download quality setting. This is now different from the streaming quality for now. Please check settings.
  • Open Google search when pressing on an actor (if Marlin is off)
  • New list view for series seasons
  • Open video in external player support (VLC)
  • Carousel: to use the carousel in home, add tag "sf_carousel" to any collection in Jellyfin.
  • Collection lists: to show other collections on the home screen add the tag "sf_promoted" to any collection
  • Smaller posters in landscape & all image cards are a bit smaller
  • Better login error messages
